name: Disco Room (Beeman)
description:
What do you get when you add an "o" to the end of "disc"? One groovy time! 

My entry for the Game Jam "Disc Room" 

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/WillCHYoung

Music Credits:

First Level Song:
Groovy Tunes by Tom Fiu

Second Level Song:
Funk Cool Groove by Free Vibes

Third Level Song: 
Who Likes To Party by Kevin MacLeod
